house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1989 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include view, private spa, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Brothers Realt Coldwell Banker Brothers Realt
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dishwasher, EatIn Kitchen, Gazebo, Loft, Microwave, Trash Compacter
